long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An all-in-one plugin for cloud-telephony services. Use this plugin to dial any number from any web page using our various cloud telephony services like Click To Call, Masked Outbound Call, Normal Outbound call, etc.
Just login to the extension and then select any number from anywhere that you want to use and that's it you are good to go.
